title: How This Florida Couple Stole People's Properties Using Just A Dollar
content: A Florida couple is facing charges of stealing properties through a simple scam that costs less than a dollar to execute
summary: A Florida couple is facing charges of stealing properties through a simple scam that costs less than a dollar to execute

title: "Give Our Land Back": Australian Lawmaker Heckles King Charles At Parliament
content: Indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe, known for her fierce opposition to the monarchy, shouted anti-colonial slogans at King Charles during his visit to the Australian parliament on Monday.
summary: Indigenous senator Lidia Thorpe, known for her fierce opposition to the monarchy, shouted anti-colonial slogans at King Charles during his visit to the Australian parliament on Monday.

title: "Looking Forward To Addressing NDTV World Summit": PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Sunday that he is looking forward to addressing the 'NDTV World Summit 2024 - The India Century' which will take place today.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Sunday that he is looking forward to addressing the 'NDTV World Summit 2024 - The India Century' which will take place today.

title: Cash, Cologne, Private Shower: Inside Ex Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar's Bunker
content: The Israeli military has released footage of what it claims to be the bunker of ex Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, which he occupied during the first half of the ongoing Gaza conflict.
summary: The Israeli military has released footage of what it claims to be the bunker of ex Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, which he occupied during the first half of the ongoing Gaza conflict.

title: Live Updates: PM Modi Speaks At NDTV World Summit On 'The India Century'
content: Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, and Airtel Chairperson Sunil Bharti will also speak at the two-day event.
summary: Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, and Airtel Chairperson Sunil Bharti will also speak at the two-day event.

title: Brazil President Cancels BRICS Trip After Minor Brain Hemorrhage From Fall
content: Brazilian PresidentLuizInacioLuladaSilva, 78, will now participate in the BRICS meeting in Russia via videoconference.
summary: Brazilian PresidentLuizInacioLuladaSilva, 78, will now participate in the BRICS meeting in Russia via videoconference.

title: Video: Yahya Sinwar's Wife Spotted With 26-Lakh Hermes Bag In Gaza Tunnel
content: Former Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed in an Israeli operation in southern Gaza last week, was seen moving inside a tunnel with his wife and children, hours before the deadly October 7 attack on Israel last year.
summary: Former Hamas chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed in an Israeli operation in southern Gaza last week, was seen moving inside a tunnel with his wife and children, hours before the deadly October 7 attack on Israel last year.

title: Watch: Donald Trump Makes Fries At McDonald's, Then A Jibe At Kamala Harris
content: Republican Donald Trump on Sunday visited a McDonald's and served french fries while he was campaigning in Pennsylvania ahead of the US presidential elections.
summary: Republican Donald Trump on Sunday visited a McDonald's and served french fries while he was campaigning in Pennsylvania ahead of the US presidential elections.

title: Once Bursting With Life, Beirut Now Lies In Ruins
content: Just a month ago, south Beirut's bustling streets were packed with traffic, families strolling about and youths in cafes, but now silence dominates the abandoned Hezbollah bastion, interrupted only by the sound of Israeli bombs.
summary: Just a month ago, south Beirut's bustling streets were packed with traffic, families strolling about and youths in cafes, but now silence dominates the abandoned Hezbollah bastion, interrupted only by the sound of Israeli bombs.

title: Justin Trudeau Wrecked Canada-India Ties, Says Indian Envoy
content: Indian envoy to Canada Sanjay Kumar Verma - now withdrawn by New Delhi -- has accused Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of wrecking bilateral ties with India and reiterated that Ottawa's allegations are politically motivated. O
summary: Indian envoy to Canada Sanjay Kumar Verma - now withdrawn by New Delhi -- has accused Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of wrecking bilateral ties with India and reiterated that Ottawa's allegations are politically motivated. O

title: Kamala Harris, Now 60, Questions 78-Year-Old Trump's Fitness To Be President
content: Kamala Harris turned 60 on Sunday in the final stretch of a knife-edge election battle with 78-year-old Donald Trump, as she urged a Black congregation in Georgia to embrace compassionate values while others "spread hate, sow fear and cause chaos."
summary: Kamala Harris turned 60 on Sunday in the final stretch of a knife-edge election battle with 78-year-old Donald Trump, as she urged a Black congregation in Georgia to embrace compassionate values while others "spread hate, sow fear and cause chaos."

title: India Should Be On UN Security Council Permanently: Russia's Top Diplomat
content: Russia's top diplomat has said that his country believes that India, Brazil and African countries should be represented in the UN Security Council on a permanent basis, state-owned TASS news agency reported on Sunday.
summary: Russia's top diplomat has said that his country believes that India, Brazil and African countries should be represented in the UN Security Council on a permanent basis, state-owned TASS news agency reported on Sunday.

title: India's Digital Revolution An Example For World: Nobel Laureate Paul Romer
content: Nobel Laureate Professor Paul Michael Romer on Sunday hailed India's digital revolution as one of the most inspiring and interesting success stories and said that it has set a new benchmark for world powers.
summary: Nobel Laureate Professor Paul Michael Romer on Sunday hailed India's digital revolution as one of the most inspiring and interesting success stories and said that it has set a new benchmark for world powers.

title: Study Reveals The Science Behind Children's Short Attention Span
content: A new study reveals that kindergarten-aged children tend to over-explore during tasks, not due to lack of understanding or attention, but possibly due to curiosity or underdeveloped working memory.
summary: A new study reveals that kindergarten-aged children tend to over-explore during tasks, not due to lack of understanding or attention, but possibly due to curiosity or underdeveloped working memory.

title: Elon Musk's Daily $1 Million Payouts At Trump Rally Draw Legal Scrutiny
content: Elon Musk promised on Saturday to give away $1 million each day until November's election to someone who signs his online petition, with the first prize awarded at a PAC event supporting Donald Trump, raising questions about legality of the payments.
summary: Elon Musk promised on Saturday to give away $1 million each day until November's election to someone who signs his online petition, with the first prize awarded at a PAC event supporting Donald Trump, raising questions about legality of the payments.

title: 87 Killed In Israel's Attack On Gaza After Yahya Sinwar's Killing
content: Israel said it hit Hezbollah's intelligence headquarters in its latest strikes on the Lebanese capital Beirut on Sunday, while officials in Gaza said rescuers were still recovering people from the rubble after an Israeli strike that killed dozens.
summary: Israel said it hit Hezbollah's intelligence headquarters in its latest strikes on the Lebanese capital Beirut on Sunday, while officials in Gaza said rescuers were still recovering people from the rubble after an Israeli strike that killed dozens.

title: Millions Of Cubans Still Without Power After 3rd Grid Failure
content: Millions of Cubans awoke on Sunday to find their homes still without power after another partial grid failure overnight, deepening a crisis that has raised questions over the viability of the government's efforts to reestablish electrical service.
summary: Millions of Cubans awoke on Sunday to find their homes still without power after another partial grid failure overnight, deepening a crisis that has raised questions over the viability of the government's efforts to reestablish electrical service.

title: UK To Address Backlog Of Modern Slavery Cases Amid 50 Million Trapped
content: The UK Government has announced the recruitment of 200 additional Home Office staff to address a backlog of 23,300 modern slavery cases inherited from the previous administration.
summary: The UK Government has announced the recruitment of 200 additional Home Office staff to address a backlog of 23,300 modern slavery cases inherited from the previous administration.

title: "Maggots, Slime, And Disease": World's Dirtiest Ships Named And Shamed
content: The Center for Disease Control (CDC) has revealed the top 10 filthiest cruise ships of 2024 after health officials randomly inspected 114 different ships.
summary: The Center for Disease Control (CDC) has revealed the top 10 filthiest cruise ships of 2024 after health officials randomly inspected 114 different ships.

title: From Comedian To President Of Ukraine: All About Volodymyr Zelenskyy
content: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is actively seeking support from Western allies for his "Victory Plan," which aims to end the ongoing war with Russia.
summary: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is actively seeking support from Western allies for his "Victory Plan," which aims to end the ongoing war with Russia.
